page.title: 18FRISKNEY SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: The school has 115 children on roll and a staff (including the Head) of 4.2. There are 2 junior classes and 2 infant classes.The curriculum is much wider and relevant than in the past with science and computers given more emphasis. There is a wide variety of teaching methods and approaches- groups or individuals may be working on different topics at any given time as well as the class working together. This requires careful planning and monitoring. There is a very friendly and co-operative atmosphere between the staff, children, governors and parents .Widening the curriculum, making it more relevant, using modern teaching methods and ideas is desirable but difficult with no extra resources. There needs to be balance, if the basic tools of education, the 3 R's are not to suffer.
